title: Blood moon Kennen Ultimate Invisible
body:
Does anyone have the same issue? I played a game today and the {{champion:85}}  kennen with the bloodmoon skin. Everytime when he ultimate it is invisible, but my teammate still got stun, and the dmg is also on. Riot fixxxxxxx it.{{item:3070}}{{champion:222}}  {{item:3070}} 
orz

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report. We're aware of the issue and are investigating.
